column4: cane someone please help me? I've upgraded from xubuntu dapper
to edgy (by editing sources.list and then running update,
dist-upgrade) but now xserver won't start. please help
wait
login in the terminal and try this: sudo apt-get install xubuntu-desktop
ok. trying that now
it should get the desktop up and running, but if it doesn't, do: sudo apt-get install --reinstall xubuntu-desktop
i'll take note of your second command, in case the 1st doesn't work
how's it going? :)
re:how's it going? -->apt-get xubuntu-desktop is still doing its thing.
hehe ok
it's done
the apt-get of xubuntu-desktop is done.
i've finished running your command "apt-get xubuntu-desktop". how can i check whether xserver works now?
i don't know what init.d is, but xubuntu uses xfce
ok try sudo /etc/init.d/xfce restart
when you are talking to me, please use my name, because it's easier to track messages for me. thanks
use sudo /etc/init.d/xdm restart
will i lose connection with you guys, if i do that?
do what nothlit said: ls /etc/init.d | grep dm
nothlit here's the grep results: gdm, mdadm, mdadm-raid
